content.text:
# Draft:PugWars (2018 Moblie Sandbox Shooting Game)

----
PugWars is a game where you fight cats and Pug dogs. This game was released on October 27th, 2018 And It Was Updated On October 29th 2024
Gameplay
The gameplay is identical to BattleBox, so expect that it is unfinished. You are playing as a pug or a cat, depending on servers. There are ywo gamemodes which are Team Fight and Sandbox, in-game known as (No kill, friends). Despite being the Sandbox mode, players can still kill you in that mode.
There is nothing else about this game aside from building and fighting and you can't chat in the game.
Shop Categories
(WORK IN PROGRESS)
BearWars
BearWars was the first game that got renamed and redesigned to PugWars
